name: url-to-png
description: url-to-png is a self-hosted microservice to capture full-page screenshots of URLs and return PNG images. It exposes a simple HTTP API and optional minimal web form for ad-hoc use.
features: Screenshot API: Capture website screenshots via simple HTTP API calls with URL parameters.
Full-page capture: Render complete web pages including content below the fold.
Custom dimensions: Specify viewport width and height for screenshots of any size.
Format options: Return screenshots as PNG images with configurable quality settings.
JavaScript rendering: Execute JavaScript on pages before capturing for dynamic content.
Custom delays: Wait for specified time before capturing to allow content to load.
Headless browser: Use headless Chrome for accurate rendering of modern web pages.
Caching: Cache screenshots to improve performance for repeated requests.
Web interface: Test screenshot capture through an optional simple web form.
Microservice architecture: Deploy as a lightweight microservice for integration into larger systems.
Docker deployment: Run easily in containers for scalable screenshot generation.
API authentication: Protect the service with optional API key authentication.
